meta.title: Nikolai Grushkovsky
meta.description: A full-stack software developer with over 5 years of experience in building web applications.

about.title: About
about.body: Hey, I'm Nikolai. I'm a full-stack software developer with over 4 years of experience in building web applications. I also develop libraries, tools, and other things. In my free time, I enjoy working on personal projects and contributing to open-source software.

connect.title: Connect
connect.body: I'm always open to meeting new people. Feel free to reach out!

footer.body: When done well, software is invisible.
